original_text: This is how the army of King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon got power over Jerusalem. In the tenth month of the ninth year that Zedekiah had ruled Judah as king, Nebuchadnezzar's army marched to attack Jerusalem. The whole army made their camp around the city.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕의 제구년 열째 달에 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕과 그의 모든 군대가 와서 예루살렘을 에워싸고 치더니

sentences.original_text: This is how the army of King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon
In the tenth month of the ninth year
that Zedekiah had ruled Judah as king
Nebuchadnezzar's army marched to attack Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살의 군대가 예루살렘을 공격하기 위해 진군했다

sentences.original_text: The whole army made their camp around the city
sentences.korean_translation: 군대 전체가 성 주변에 진지를 만들었다
